description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ee1ac","text":"This protocol describes RNP-based CRISPR/Cas9 gene-editing to generate knock-out iPSCs. iPSCs are transfected with sgRNA, recombinant Cas9, and GFP using Lipofectamine Stem. After FACS sorting to enrich for successfully transfected cells, individual clones are picked and expanded for further analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8cr13","text":"Accutase-dissociate iPSCs on the morning of transfection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fuso6","text":"1 - 2 hours prior to transfection, change media to fresh, pre-warmed mTeSR + RI ( /well). Incubate mixture for   at  , then add mixture dropwise to iPSCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2v2pl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3C2CCFE04DE611EDAB74A7DF8474B14B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3F4CAD804DE611EDAB74A7DF8474B14B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj995","text":"On the following day, individualize iPSCs with Accutase and plate onto 6 Matrigelcoated wells of a 6-well plate in mTeSR + RI.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"650ss","text":"Coat 1-2x 10 cm dishes per condition with Matrigel and add   mTeSR (+RI +Penicillin/Streptomycin) on the day of FACS sorting. Keep 10 cm dishes in cell culture incubator at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":173,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"31mlu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5d0ho","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag95r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcldj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqq0r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"88C174F04DE611EDAB74A7DF8474B14B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"84904E604DE611EDAB74A7DF8474B14B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f1s07","text":"Because of the increased risk for microbiological contamination during FACS sorting, we recommend supplementing mTeSR medium with Penicillin/Streptomycin (P/S). ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ri17","text":"Collect transfected iPSCs with an Accutase split and resuspend into mTeSR (+RI +P/S). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5017","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bprlu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsurh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":66}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"80n0l","text":"The media volume depends on size of the cell pellet; we have used   for resuspending iPSCs from 4 wells of a 6-well plate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"A24907E54DE611EDBCE60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aik21","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"52f8b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3pp5v","text":"Transfection efficiency with Lipofectamine Stem should be about 30%.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5shs","text":"Exchange media on the next day to mTeSR + P/S, but without RI. Keep feeding cells daily with mTeSR + P/S. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4ja6","text":"Pick clones when individual colonies reach a size of ~ 1 mm. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f47iu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f4d87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9qg03","text":"This should be ~ 9 days after FACS sorting for KOLF2.1 iPSCs.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pmiq","text":"For the first attempt of CRISPR/Cas9 editing, we recommend picking 24 colonies per condition. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb4vt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d53l3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9v6ma","text":"If none of the picked clones has the desired genotype, the editing protocol may need to be optimized and/or more clones should be picked during the next attempt.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"268s8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b30r","text":"For freezing down a higher number of clones, cells can again be Accutase-split into Eppendorf tubes, then resuspended in cryopreservation media:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f14sd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"876st","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ftk3c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["208",100],"data":[["DMSO","10% "],["Knockout Serum Replacement","20%"],["mTeSR","70% "]],"guid":"1A5A9CC04DEC11EDAB74A7DF8474B14B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["DMSO","10% "],["Knockout Serum Replacement","20%"],["mTeSR","70% "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
